import{io}from"socket.io-client";import Cookies from"js-cookie";var connestSid=function connestSid(){if(Cookies.get("connect.sid")){return Cookies.get("connect.sid").replace("s:","").split(".")[0];}};var URL="http://172.20.10.2:8000";var socket=io(URL,//   { autoConnect: false },
{query:"session_id=".concat(connestSid())},{transports:["websocket"]},{withCredentials:true});export default socket;
